div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2372 Ansouis, near Aix, 1861 (52) Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 4000 AR Massalia: ob. (some with letters on cheek) Disposition: Marseille 225 (but mixed with general collection) RN 1861, p. 332 Carpentin, RN 1861, pp. 397-406, illus. Laugier, Revue de Marseille et de Provence 1886, p. 450 Allotte de la Fuÿe, Tourdan, pp. 50-1 ("propriété de Sabran") Blanchet, Traité, p. 598, no. 251 Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 48
